title: Scp 8642 17
content:
You decide to investigate the mysterious double doors. As you make your way to the doors through the maze of filing cabinets, you notice that the trio have both stopped working and stopped trying to hide that they’re watching you. It makes you uncomfortable, but you’ve committed to investigating whatever’s behind the doors now. Reaching your goal, you raise your hand to the doorknob, and…

“What do you think you’re doing?”

Turning swiftly, you come face-to-face with the barrel of a revolver. Hannah’s eyes glare at you from behind the sights, and you can see in them that she knows how to use her weapon. “You’re awfully curious for an auditor,” she remarks. “Well whether you really are one or not, you’re in too deep now for a happy ending.” You see the trio moving toward you out of the corner of your eye, and you know you’d have no chance in a fight; your only choice is to run. With mere seconds to decide, you…

||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/18 Try to escape through the doors you entered from.]||= 17||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/20 Try to escape through the mysterious double doors.]||
